metadata.title: CVE-2017-17565 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.9.x allowing PV guest OS users tocause a denial of service (host OS crash) if shadow mode and log-dirty modeare in place, because of an incorrect assertion related to M2P.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
